name: The Triwizard Tournament: Your Own Wizarding Journey
name_original: The Triwizard Tournament: Your Own Wizarding Journey
description: In this interactive narrative you will have a chance to compete in the Triwizard Tournament, just like Harry Potter did in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. In this journey every choice matters and the right ones could lead you to honor and glory. However, make sure to choose carefully because one wrong choice could cost you the tournament.
